des: 'Math Polynomials' has questions on fractions and gives hints when requested by the user. The skill categorizes questions in easy, medium and hard. Users can select a category from easy, medium and hard to have a basic knowledge on equations and functions. User can skip to skip the question, say hint or repeat to repeat the question .
